Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.characters

Class PlayerCharacters

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.characters.CharacterCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.characters.PlayerCharacters
public class PlayerCharacters extends CharacterCard
GameCharacter class modelling the character that modifies the state of a player

    • PlayerCharacters

  • Method Details

    • applyEffect

      public void applyEffect(CharacterStruct params)
      This method overrides the standard behaviour of the CharacterCard class, parent of PlayerCharacters, by implementing all the game effects concerning the change of state of the current player
      Overrides:
      applyEffect in class CharacterCard
      Parameters:
      params - A struct containing all the object modifiable by any effect. This makes the applyEffect method in all the different child class have the same signature, thus making it interchangeable

    • removeEffect

      public void removeEffect(CharacterStruct params)
      This method overrides the standard behaviour of the CharacterCard class, parent of PlayerCharacters, by removing all the game effects concerning the change of state of the current player. It removes only those effects that need it but still has a case for each possible effect to ensure complete interchangeability
      Overrides:
      removeEffect in class CharacterCard
      Parameters:
      params - A struct containing all the object modifiable by any effect. This makes the removeEffect method in all the different child class have the same signature, thus making it interchangeable

    • increaseMovementTwoEffect

      private void increaseMovementTwoEffect(Player currentPlayer)
      This method implements the Character Card used to increase the possible movements of Mother Nature by two
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The player whose assistant will have two more possible moves for Mother Nature

    • decreaseMovementTwoEffect

      private void decreaseMovementTwoEffect(Player currentPlayer)
      This method removes the effect of the Character Card used to increase the possible movements of Mother Nature by two
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The player whose assistant has two more possible moves for Mother Nature

    • replaceStudentEntranceEffect

      private void replaceStudentEntranceEffect(Player currentPlayer, int[] studentsCard, int[] studentsEntrance)
      This method implements the Character Card used to change some students from this card with some from the current player's entrance
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The player playing the card
      studentsCard - The array of students that will move from this card to the entrance
      studentsEntrance - The array of students that will move from the entrance to this card

    • exchangeTwoEntranceDiningEffect

      private void exchangeTwoEntranceDiningEffect(Player currentPlayer, int[] studentsEntrance, int[] studentsDining)
      This method implements the Character Card used to exchange up to two students between a player's entrance and dining room
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The player playing the card
      studentsEntrance - The array of students coming from the player's entrance
      studentsDining - The array of students coming from the player's dining room

    • putOneDiningRoomEffect

      private void putOneDiningRoomEffect(Player currentPlayer, Color color)
      This method implements the Character Card used to put one student from this card to the player's dining room
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The player playing the card
      color - The color of the student to be moved

    • returnThreeDiningRoomBag

      private void returnThreeDiningRoomBag(Vector<Team> teams, Color color, StudentsBag studentsBag)
      This method implements the Character Card used to return up to three students of a desired color of each player to the students' bag
      Parameters:
      teams - The vector containing all the teams playing the game
      color - The color of the students to be removed
